scripts.bump_patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -u && echo "bump version to `npm pkg get version`" | git commit -F -
scripts.bump_minor: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -u && echo "bump version to `npm pkg get version`" | git commit -F -
scripts.bump_major: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -u && echo "bump version to `npm pkg get version`" | git commit -F -
